Sclerosing epithelioid fibrosarcoma     Treatment of sclerosing epithelioid fibrosarcoma may include the following:               -  Surgery to completely remove the tumor.      - A clinical trial of targeted therapy, radiation therapy, and surgery with or without chemotherapy.
